CustomMetadata.label: Issue with the data & MFS Partial Failu

values.value: There was a partial failure response from MFS with the request. Refer to the error message for further details and raise a support ticket - MX Finance board: (https://doordash.atlassian.net/secure/CreateIssue.jspa?pid=13864&issuetype=1&priority=4) and slack on #eng-mx-finance channel :(https://app.slack.com/client/E02180LFT96/CUT5HLH2P) with Business account id, Store Id, error message and any other relevant information.
